question: 触る
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>touch</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to touch</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: You're an idiot. You try <vocabulary>to touch</vocabulary> a <reading>saw</reading> (<ja>さわ</ja>).
